message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $22,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond the asking price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I'm only willing to pay up to $12,000 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value.  While I can't go as low as $12,000, I'm willing to come down to $19,000. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $16,000 for the product.
